about_the_game:
Outcore: Desktop Adventure: The Amazing Super Duper Ultra Hyper Mama Mia Papa Pipa Wawa Wee Waa Five Shekel Falafel Deluxe Extra Sugoi Mega Kawaii Gold Diamond Nirosta Plastic Director's Cut Special Edition Supporter Pack Plus PLUS Is the most powerful DLC in the world of GAMING.

Normal people play Outcore for free, or may even with an ordinary clown nose, but true GAMERS like you settle for nothing less than the best. That's why when you buy Outcore: Desktop Adventure: The Amazing Super Duper Ultra Hyper Mama Mia Papa Pipa Wawa Wee Waa Five Shekel Falafel Deluxe Extra Sugoi Mega Kawaii Gold Diamond Nirosta Plastic Director's Cut Special Edition Supporter Pack Plus PLUS you get the amazing GAMING CLOWN NOSE.

That's right baby, with this 1,000,,00,00,,,, * 0 nose power full RGB GAMING clown nose, you can play Outcore like the god that you are.

  • The exact same clown nose from the "Outcore: Clown Nose Supporter Pack" DLC, except it changes colors and you get to pay even more money
  • Like, 1 or 2 extra dialogues compared to the "Outcore: Clown Nose Supporter Pack"
  • Become the god of wasting money on overpriced equipment that has "GAMING" in its name

(This DLC barely adds any content at all, you should probably only buy it if you wish to support the game)
